snippet: ROSENTHAL--Irwin M. The volunteers and staff of the Crohn's & Colitis Foundation of America join with the IBD community in mourning the passing of Irwin M. Rosenthal, co-founder of CCFA, philanthropist, entrepreneur, and attorney. Motivated by his wife Suzanne's struggle with Crohn's disease, Irwin co-founded the Crohn's & Colitis Foundation of America. It was the combination of Irwin's tenacity, compassion and love for his wife that put CCFA on the road to success. His impact on the lives of patients with Crohn's disease and ulcerative colitis is immeasurable. Donations in his honor can be made to CCFA's Irwin M. and Suzanne R. Rosenthal IBD Resource Center at online.ccfa.org/ IrwinRosenthal. Our sincere condolences to his family. 1/3
